author: cms-sw
body:
- Added el10 IBs
- Improved BUILD_OPTS key , it now supports to set `--use-system-tools <comma-separated-tols>` , `--build-without <comma-separate-tools>`  and `--vectorization <comma-seaprated-microarchs>`. Format of BUILD_OPTS is comma separated list of option where each option could be `key:<colon-separated-list` e.g.
 - `BUILD_OPTS=system:gcc:autotools` :  To use `--use-system-tools gcc,autotools`
 - `BUILD_OPTS=system:gcc:autotools,without:rocm:cuda` : To use `--use-system-tools gcc,autotools --build-without rocm,cuda`
title: Added el10 IB; improved BUILD_OPTS to support system,without and microarchs
